description: Cinco de Mayo is just around the corner, which means it's time to start thinking about cocktails! If you're looking for a unique twist on the classic margarita, try replacing the usual tequila with Herradura Plata.Herradura is a brand of premium tequila that offers 100% agave from the lowlands of Amatitlan, Guatemala, and Jalisco, Mexico. This&nbsp;spirit has an aroma with rich flavors, making this spirit the perfect cocktail base for your drinks, especially&nbsp;Margaritas!
name: Fresh Margarita
recipeIngredient: Lime wedge for rim and garnish (optional)
Coarse salt or granulated sugar for rimming (optional)
¾ oz. Freshly squeezed lime juice

recipeInstructions.name: Wet the rim of the glass with lime and dip in coarse salt or granulated sugar.
